comment_body:
Is the SSS YouTube Channel still active? When I click, it says it does not exist

Edit: The book isn’t available either

So it has to be title for example [Thanksgiving 2021] the turkey's revenge
I mean it's just an example. Or is it? Please answer.

My fellow moderator did me a favor by posting this for me since I don’t have access to a computer right now. I was in a [terrible car accident](https://twitter.com/rafael_gravy/status/1460321171673694215?s=21) this week and my car along with my laptop was completely wrecked. The book and the SSS channel don’t exist anymore so those prizes are not available. I can do narration on my personal channel though so that’s cool if the author wants it.

You have whatever yoru title is, and then before or after it you label it [Thanksgiving 2021].

For example:

Dinner for the Dead [Thanksgiving 2021]

[Thanksgiving 2021] Dinner for the Dead

Either one will pop up when searching by the tag [Thanksgiving 2021]

Holy shit, I'm so sorry Gravy.

Got a link for a GoFundMe or anything? I'm sure plenty of us would love to chip in even a buck or two for our fearless (*in a land of fear*!) mod.
That’s terrible! Get well soon, Gravy.
Holy crap man. I hope you're ok. Thoughts and prayers out to you.

Hey man I'm new. Do I need karma to participate in this? I just made my account. I was inspired by a friend. He left us so on his honor I'm gonna share my own stories. He always told me I should. But he talked about karma and that some places require it to let you post.
Think I might just do a Kofi thing I’ve been meaning to do anyway for a while. I’ll let you know when it’s set up. I appreciate the thought!
this place don't require a karma threshold to post
Please do let us know when you do! Our thoughts are with you.
